description: silver shallow bowl plate, five scallop edge, rope style edge, double dragon coat of arms with ribbon
markings: \'LS3486(Circled)\', [crown] above \'JG\', [lion], [bear with fish in mouth] and [R] within shield at underside of rim; \'FIEL PERO DESDICHADO\' engraved in ribbon at crest
title: Soup Plate
